attributes.action: Issue the police force of the united kingdom Non-Lethal and Lethal weapons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The view of our police force is of the local "bobby" walking down the road greeting everybody as he/she goes past. This is no longer the reality. With International gangs, illegal arms dealers etc and more police deaths through guns and knifes than ever it is now time for our officers who put there lives on the line to be equipped with a taser and/or a lethal weapon. After all what use is a night stick against a semi automtic weapon ?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
